game_description: *NEW UPDATE* New Physics Update enhances the throwing experience! Immerse yourself in a breathtaking virtual reality setting and practice your Disc Golf skills in the comfort of your own home. Travel to an out-of-this-world land following the lead of a golden dragon and become a Disc Ninja! Explore awe-inspiring environments that include high mountains, treacherous valleys, beautiful palaces, and temples full of deadly traps. The game includes "Rush Mode" update that expands key gameplay elements while incorporating multiple QoL improvements. Key features: • 15 maps with beautiful, stylized graphics – with even more to come soon; • Polished disc throwing mechanics that are easy to learn, but hard to master; • Two game modes – Classic disc-golf experience and manic race-like Rush; • Unlockable collectibles, including unique ninja costumes and disc designs to add splendor to your multiplayer games; • Multiplayer mode that allows up to 4 ninjas to compete against each other.

review_3: I have been playing disc golf since 2013 and when this came up as a VR game I had to try it. The ability to throw discs in my own house was exactly what I imagined playing in VR. I will say, make sure you have plenty of space. I smashed my hand into the closet multiple times doing big throws and actually knocked the closet door off its hinges twice! The game is fairly short but very challenging and I went back to play some courses again to get more stars. Some courses have a sweet spot to throw to and get a lower throw count and it can be fun trying to find those sweet spots to land your throws. Judging the force and distance is challenging too as if you throw it too far it will fall off. Ledge then regenerate in your hand and you lose a stroke. While it isn't perfect it is still fun and probably the closest to playing disc golf of any game I've ever played, which is still great since you can play it inside on a cold snowy day when it's -1 outside :)
